67  /**
68   * Like {@link TestSplitTransaction} in that we're testing {@link SplitTransaction}
69   * only the below tests are against a running cluster where {@link TestSplitTransaction}
70   * is tests against a bare {@link HRegion}.
71   */
72  @Category(LargeTests.class)
73  @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
74  public class TestSplitTransactionOnCluster {
75    private static final Log LOG =
76      LogFactory.getLog(TestSplitTransactionOnCluster.class);
77    private HBaseAdmin admin = null;
78    private MiniHBaseCluster cluster = null;
79    private static final int NB_SERVERS = 2;
80    private static CountDownLatch latch = new CountDownLatch(1);
81    private static volatile boolean secondSplit = false;
82    private static volatile boolean callRollBack = false;
83    private static volatile boolean firstSplitCompleted = false;

85    private static final HBaseTestingUtility TESTING_UTIL =
86      new HBaseTestingUtility();

88    @BeforeClass public static void before() throws Exception {
89      TESTING_UTIL.getConfiguration().setInt("hbase.balancer.period", 60000);
90      // Needed because some tests have splits happening on RS that are killed
91      // We don't want to wait 3min for the master to figure it out
92      TESTING_UTIL.getConfiguration().setInt(
93          "hbase.master.assignment.timeoutmonitor.timeout", 4000);

107   private HRegionInfo getAndCheckSingleTableRegion(final List<HRegion> regions) {
108     assertEquals(1, regions.size());
109     return regions.get(0).getRegionInfo();

112   @Test(timeout = 2000000)
113   public void testShouldFailSplitIfZNodeDoesNotExistDueToPrevRollBack() throws Exception {
114     final byte[] tableName = Bytes
115         .toBytes("testShouldFailSplitIfZNodeDoesNotExistDueToPrevRollBack");
116     HBaseAdmin admin = new HBaseAdmin(TESTING_UTIL.getConfiguration());
117     try {
118       // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
119       HTable t = createTableAndWait(tableName, Bytes.toBytes("cf"));
120       final List<HRegion> regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
121       HRegionInfo hri = getAndCheckSingleTableRegion(regions);
122       int regionServerIndex = cluster.getServerWith(regions.get(0).getRegionName());
123       final HRegionServer regionServer = cluster.getRegionServer(regionServerIndex);
124       insertData(tableName, admin, t);
125       // Turn off balancer so it doesn't cut in and mess up our placements.
126       this.admin.setBalancerRunning(false, false);
127       // Turn off the meta scanner so it don't remove parent on us.
128       cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(false);
129 
130       new Thread() {
131         public void run() {
132           SplitTransaction st = null;
133           st = new MockedSplitTransaction(regions.get(0), Bytes.toBytes("row2"));
134           try {
135             st.prepare();
136             st.execute(regionServer, regionServer);
137           } catch (IOException e) {
138 
139           }
140         }
141       }.start();
142       for (int i = 0; !callRollBack && i < 100; i++) {
143         Thread.sleep(100);
144       }
145       assertTrue("Waited too long for rollback", callRollBack);
146       SplitTransaction st = null;
147       st = new MockedSplitTransaction(regions.get(0), Bytes.toBytes("row2"));
148       try {
149         secondSplit = true;
150         st.prepare();
151         st.execute(regionServer, regionServer);
152       } catch (IOException e) {
153         LOG.debug("Rollback started :"+ e.getMessage());
154         st.rollback(regionServer, regionServer);
155       }
156       for (int i=0; !firstSplitCompleted && i<100; i++) {
157         Thread.sleep(100);
158       }
159       assertTrue("fist split did not complete", firstSplitCompleted);
160       NavigableMap<String, RegionState> rit = cluster.getMaster().getAssignmentManager()
161           .getRegionsInTransition();
162       for (int i=0; rit.containsKey(hri.getTableNameAsString()) && i<100; i++) {
163         Thread.sleep(100);
164       }
165       assertFalse("region still in transition", rit.containsKey(hri.getTableNameAsString()));
166       List<HRegion> onlineRegions = regionServer.getOnlineRegions(tableName);
167       // Region server side split is successful.
168       assertEquals("The parent region should be splitted", 2, onlineRegions.size());
169       //Should be present in RIT
170       List<HRegionInfo> regionsOfTable = cluster.getMaster().getAssignmentManager().getRegionsOfTable(tableName);
171       // Master side should also reflect the same
172       assertEquals("No of regions in master", 2, regionsOfTable.size());
173     } finally {
174       admin.setBalancerRunning(true, false);
175       secondSplit = false;
176       firstSplitCompleted = false;
177       callRollBack = false;
178       cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(true);
179     }
180     if (admin.isTableAvailable(tableName) && admin.isTableEnabled(tableName)) {
181       admin.disableTable(tableName);
182       admin.deleteTable(tableName);
183       admin.close();
184     }
185   }

187   /**
188    * A test that intentionally has master fail the processing of the split message.
189    * Tests that the regionserver split ephemeral node gets cleaned up if it
190    * crashes and that after we process server shutdown, the daughters are up on
191    * line.
192    * @throws IOException
193    * @throws InterruptedException
194    * @throws NodeExistsException
195    * @throws KeeperException
196    */
197   @Test (timeout = 300000) public void testRSSplitEphemeralsDisappearButDaughtersAreOnlinedAfterShutdownHandling()
198   throws IOException, InterruptedException, NodeExistsException, KeeperException {
199     final byte [] tableName =
200       Bytes.toBytes("ephemeral");
201 
202     // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
203     HTable t = createTableAndWait(tableName, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
204     List<HRegion> regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
205     HRegionInfo hri = getAndCheckSingleTableRegion(regions);
206 
207     int tableRegionIndex = ensureTableRegionNotOnSameServerAsMeta(admin, hri);
208 
209     // Turn off balancer so it doesn't cut in and mess up our placements.
210     this.admin.setBalancerRunning(false, true);
211     // Turn off the meta scanner so it don't remove parent on us.
212     cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(false);
213     try {
214       // Add a bit of load up into the table so splittable.
215       TESTING_UTIL.loadTable(t, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
216       // Get region pre-split.
217       HRegionServer server = cluster.getRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
218       printOutRegions(server, "Initial regions: ");
219       int regionCount = server.getOnlineRegions().size();
220       // Now, before we split, set special flag in master, a flag that has
221       // it FAIL the processing of split.
222       SplitRegionHandler.TEST_SKIP = true;
223       // Now try splitting and it should work.
224       split(hri, server, regionCount);
225       // Get daughters
226       List<HRegion> daughters = checkAndGetDaughters(tableName);
227       // Assert the ephemeral node is up in zk.
228       String path = ZKAssign.getNodeName(t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher(),
229         hri.getEncodedName());
230       Stat stats =
231         t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher().getRecoverableZooKeeper().exists(path, false);
232       LOG.info("EPHEMERAL NODE BEFORE SERVER ABORT, path=" + path + ", stats=" + stats);
233       RegionTransitionData rtd =
234         ZKAssign.getData(t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher(),
235           hri.getEncodedName());
236       // State could be SPLIT or SPLITTING.
237       assertTrue(rtd.getEventType().equals(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_SPLIT) ||
238         rtd.getEventType().equals(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_SPLITTING));
239       // Now crash the server
240       cluster.abortRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
241       waitUntilRegionServerDead();
242       awaitDaughters(tableName, daughters.size());
243 
244       // Assert daughters are online.
245       regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
246       for (HRegion r: regions) {
247         assertTrue(daughters.contains(r));
248       }
249       // Finally assert that the ephemeral SPLIT znode was cleaned up.
250       for (int i=0; i<100; i++) {
251         // wait a bit (10s max) for the node to disappear
252         stats = t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher().getRecoverableZooKeeper().exists(path, false);
253         if (stats == null) break;
254         Thread.sleep(100);
255       }
256       LOG.info("EPHEMERAL NODE AFTER SERVER ABORT, path=" + path + ", stats=" + stats);
257       assertTrue(stats == null);
258     } finally {
259       // Set this flag back.
260       SplitRegionHandler.TEST_SKIP = false;
261       admin.setBalancerRunning(true, false);
262       cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(true);
263       t.close();
264     }
265   }

267   @Test (timeout = 300000) public void testExistingZnodeBlocksSplitAndWeRollback()
268   throws IOException, InterruptedException, NodeExistsException, KeeperException {
269     final byte [] tableName =
270       Bytes.toBytes("testExistingZnodeBlocksSplitAndWeRollback");
271 
272     // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
273     HTable t = createTableAndWait(tableName, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
274     List<HRegion> regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
275     HRegionInfo hri = getAndCheckSingleTableRegion(regions);
276 
277     int tableRegionIndex = ensureTableRegionNotOnSameServerAsMeta(admin, hri);
278 
279     // Turn off balancer so it doesn't cut in and mess up our placements.
280     this.admin.setBalancerRunning(false, true);
281     // Turn off the meta scanner so it don't remove parent on us.
282     cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(false);
283     try {
284       // Add a bit of load up into the table so splittable.
285       TESTING_UTIL.loadTable(t, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
286       // Get region pre-split.
287       HRegionServer server = cluster.getRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
288       printOutRegions(server, "Initial regions: ");
289       int regionCount = server.getOnlineRegions().size();
290       // Insert into zk a blocking znode, a znode of same name as region
291       // so it gets in way of our splitting.
292       ZKAssign.createNodeClosing(t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher(),
293         hri, new ServerName("any.old.server", 1234, -1));
294       // Now try splitting.... should fail.  And each should successfully
295       // rollback.
296       this.admin.split(hri.getRegionNameAsString());
297       this.admin.split(hri.getRegionNameAsString());
298       this.admin.split(hri.getRegionNameAsString());
299       // Wait around a while and assert count of regions remains constant.
300       for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
301         Thread.sleep(100);
302         assertEquals(regionCount, server.getOnlineRegions().size());
303       }
304       // Now clear the zknode
305       ZKAssign.deleteClosingNode(t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher(), hri);
306       // Now try splitting and it should work.
307       split(hri, server, regionCount);
308       // Get daughters
309       checkAndGetDaughters(tableName);
310       // OK, so split happened after we cleared the blocking node.
311     } finally {
312       admin.setBalancerRunning(true, false);
313       cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(true);
314       t.close();
315     }
316   }

318   /**
319    * Messy test that simulates case where SplitTransactions fails to add one
320    * of the daughters up into the .META. table before crash.  We're testing
321    * fact that the shutdown handler will fixup the missing daughter region
322    * adding it back into .META.
323    * @throws IOException
324    * @throws InterruptedException
325    */
326   @Test (timeout = 300000) public void testShutdownSimpleFixup()
327   throws IOException, InterruptedException {
328     final byte [] tableName = Bytes.toBytes("testShutdownSimpleFixup");
329 
330     // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
331     HTable t = createTableAndWait(tableName, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
332     List<HRegion> regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
333     HRegionInfo hri = getAndCheckSingleTableRegion(regions);
334 
335     int tableRegionIndex = ensureTableRegionNotOnSameServerAsMeta(admin, hri);
336 
337     // Turn off balancer so it doesn't cut in and mess up our placements.
338     this.admin.setBalancerRunning(false, true);
339     // Turn off the meta scanner so it don't remove parent on us.
340     cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(false);
341     try {
342       // Add a bit of load up into the table so splittable.
343       TESTING_UTIL.loadTable(t, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
344       // Get region pre-split.
345       HRegionServer server = cluster.getRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
346       printOutRegions(server, "Initial regions: ");
347       int regionCount = server.getOnlineRegions().size();
348       // Now split.
349       split(hri, server, regionCount);
350       // Get daughters
351       List<HRegion> daughters = checkAndGetDaughters(tableName);

356       cluster.abortRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
357       waitUntilRegionServerDead();
358       awaitDaughters(tableName, daughters.size());
359       // Assert daughters are online.
360       regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);

362         assertTrue(daughters.contains(r));
363       }
364     } finally {
365       admin.setBalancerRunning(true, false);
366       cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(true);
367       t.close();
368     }
369   }

371   /**
372    * Test that if daughter split on us, we won't do the shutdown handler fixup
373    * just because we can't find the immediate daughter of an offlined parent.
374    * @throws IOException
375    * @throws InterruptedException
376    */
377   @Test (timeout=300000) public void testShutdownFixupWhenDaughterHasSplit()
378   throws IOException, InterruptedException {
379     final byte [] tableName =
380       Bytes.toBytes("testShutdownFixupWhenDaughterHasSplit");
381 
382     // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
383     HTable t = createTableAndWait(tableName, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
384     List<HRegion> regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
385     HRegionInfo hri = getAndCheckSingleTableRegion(regions);
386 
387     int tableRegionIndex = ensureTableRegionNotOnSameServerAsMeta(admin, hri);
388 
389     // Turn off balancer so it doesn't cut in and mess up our placements.
390     this.admin.setBalancerRunning(false, true);
391     // Turn off the meta scanner so it don't remove parent on us.
392     cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(false);
393     try {
394       // Add a bit of load up into the table so splittable.
395       TESTING_UTIL.loadTable(t, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
396       // Get region pre-split.
397       HRegionServer server = cluster.getRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
398       printOutRegions(server, "Initial regions: ");
399       int regionCount = server.getOnlineRegions().size();
400       // Now split.
401       split(hri, server, regionCount);
402       // Get daughters
403       List<HRegion> daughters = checkAndGetDaughters(tableName);
404       // Now split one of the daughters.
405       regionCount = server.getOnlineRegions().size();
406       HRegionInfo daughter = daughters.get(0).getRegionInfo();
407       // Compact first to ensure we have cleaned up references -- else the split
408       // will fail.
409       this.admin.compact(daughter.getRegionName());
410       daughters = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
411       HRegion daughterRegion = null;
412       for (HRegion r: daughters) {
413         if (r.getRegionInfo().equals(daughter)) daughterRegion = r;
414       }
415       assertTrue(daughterRegion != null);
416       for (int i=0; i<100; i++) {
417         if (!daughterRegion.hasReferences()) break;
418         Threads.sleep(100);
419       }
420       assertFalse("Waiting for refereces to be compacted", daughterRegion.hasReferences());
421       split(daughter, server, regionCount);
422       // Get list of daughters
423       daughters = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
424       // Now crash the server
425       cluster.abortRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
426       waitUntilRegionServerDead();
427       awaitDaughters(tableName, daughters.size());
428       // Assert daughters are online and ONLY the original daughters -- that
429       // fixup didn't insert one during server shutdown recover.
430       regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
431       assertEquals(daughters.size(), regions.size());
432       for (HRegion r: regions) {
433         assertTrue(daughters.contains(r));
434       }
435     } finally {
436       admin.setBalancerRunning(true, false);
437       cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(true);
438       t.close();
439     }
440   }

442   /**

451   @Test(timeout = 300000)

455     final byte[] tableName = Bytes.toBytes("testMasterRestartWhenSplittingIsPartial");
456 
457     // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
458     HTable t = createTableAndWait(tableName, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
459     List<HRegion> regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
460     HRegionInfo hri = getAndCheckSingleTableRegion(regions);
461 
462     int tableRegionIndex = ensureTableRegionNotOnSameServerAsMeta(admin, hri);
463 
464     // Turn off the meta scanner so it don't remove parent on us.
465     cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(false);
466     // Turn off balancer so it doesn't cut in and mess up our placements.
467     this.admin.setBalancerRunning(false, true);
468     
469     try {
470       // Add a bit of load up into the table so splittable.
471       TESTING_UTIL.loadTable(t, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
472       // Get region pre-split.
473       HRegionServer server = cluster.getRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
474       printOutRegions(server, "Initial regions: ");
475       int regionCount = server.getOnlineRegions().size();
476       // Now, before we split, set special flag in master, a flag that has
477       // it FAIL the processing of split.
478       SplitRegionHandler.TEST_SKIP = true;
479       // Now try splitting and it should work.
480       split(hri, server, regionCount);
481       // Get daughters
482       checkAndGetDaughters(tableName);
483       // Assert the ephemeral node is up in zk.
484       String path = ZKAssign.getNodeName(t.getConnection()
485           .getZooKeeperWatcher(), hri.getEncodedName());
486       Stat stats = t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher()
487           .getRecoverableZooKeeper().exists(path, false);
488       LOG.info("EPHEMERAL NODE BEFORE SERVER ABORT, path=" + path + ", stats="
489           + stats);
490       RegionTransitionData rtd = ZKAssign.getData(t.getConnection()
491           .getZooKeeperWatcher(), hri.getEncodedName());
492       // State could be SPLIT or SPLITTING.
493       assertTrue(rtd.getEventType().equals(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_SPLIT)
494           || rtd.getEventType().equals(EventType.RS_ZK_REGION_SPLITTING));
495 
496 
497       // abort and wait for new master.
498       MockMasterWithoutCatalogJanitor master = abortAndWaitForMaster();
499 
500       this.admin = new HBaseAdmin(TESTING_UTIL.getConfiguration());
501 
502       // update the hri to be offlined and splitted. 
503       hri.setOffline(true);
504       hri.setSplit(true);
505       ServerName regionServerOfRegion = master.getAssignmentManager()
506           .getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
507       assertTrue(regionServerOfRegion != null);
508 
509     } finally {
510       // Set this flag back.
511       SplitRegionHandler.TEST_SKIP = false;
512       admin.setBalancerRunning(true, false);
513       cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(true);
514       t.close();
515     }

519   /**
520    * Verifies HBASE-5806.  Here the case is that splitting is completed but before the
521    * CJ could remove the parent region the master is killed and restarted.
522    * @throws IOException
523    * @throws InterruptedException
524    * @throws NodeExistsException
525    * @throws KeeperException
526    */
527   @Test (timeout = 300000)
528   public void testMasterRestartAtRegionSplitPendingCatalogJanitor()
529       throws IOException, InterruptedException, NodeExistsException,
530       KeeperException {
531     final byte[] tableName = Bytes.toBytes("testMasterRestartAtRegionSplitPendingCatalogJanitor");
532 
533     // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
534     this.admin = new HBaseAdmin(TESTING_UTIL.getConfiguration());
535     HTable t = createTableAndWait(tableName, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
536     List<HRegion> regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
537     HRegionInfo hri = getAndCheckSingleTableRegion(regions);
538 
539     int tableRegionIndex = ensureTableRegionNotOnSameServerAsMeta(admin, hri);
540 
541     // Turn off balancer so it doesn't cut in and mess up our placements.
542     this.admin.setBalancerRunning(false, true);
543     // Turn off the meta scanner so it don't remove parent on us.
544     cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(false);
545     try {
546       // Add a bit of load up into the table so splittable.
547       TESTING_UTIL.loadTable(t, HConstants.CATALOG_FAMILY);
548       // Get region pre-split.
549       HRegionServer server = cluster.getRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
550       printOutRegions(server, "Initial regions: ");
551       int regionCount = server.getOnlineRegions().size();
552       
553       split(hri, server, regionCount);
554       // Get daughters
555       checkAndGetDaughters(tableName);
556       // Assert the ephemeral node is up in zk.
557       String path = ZKAssign.getNodeName(t.getConnection()
558           .getZooKeeperWatcher(), hri.getEncodedName());
559       Stat stats = t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher()
560           .getRecoverableZooKeeper().exists(path, false);
561       LOG.info("EPHEMERAL NODE BEFORE SERVER ABORT, path=" + path + ", stats="
562           + stats);
563       String node = ZKAssign.getNodeName(t.getConnection()
564           .getZooKeeperWatcher(), hri.getEncodedName());
565       Stat stat = new Stat();
566       byte[] data = ZKUtil.getDataNoWatch(t.getConnection()
567           .getZooKeeperWatcher(), node, stat);
568       // ZKUtil.create
569       for (int i=0; data != null && i<60; i++) {
570         Thread.sleep(1000);
571         data = ZKUtil.getDataNoWatch(t.getConnection().getZooKeeperWatcher(),
572             node, stat);
573 
574       }
575       assertNull("Waited too long for ZK node to be removed: "+node, data);
576       
577       MockMasterWithoutCatalogJanitor master = abortAndWaitForMaster();
578 
579       this.admin = new HBaseAdmin(TESTING_UTIL.getConfiguration());
580 
581       hri.setOffline(true);
582       hri.setSplit(true);
583       ServerName regionServerOfRegion = master.getAssignmentManager()
584           .getRegionServerOfRegion(hri);
585       assertTrue(regionServerOfRegion == null);
586     } finally {
587       // Set this flag back.
588       SplitRegionHandler.TEST_SKIP = false;
589       this.admin.setBalancerRunning(true, false);
590       cluster.getMaster().setCatalogJanitorEnabled(true);
591       t.close();
592     }

595   /**
596    * While transitioning node from RS_ZK_REGION_SPLITTING to
597    * RS_ZK_REGION_SPLITTING during region split,if zookeper went down split always
598    * fails for the region. HBASE-6088 fixes this scenario.
599    * This test case is to test the znode is deleted(if created) or not in roll back.
600    * 
601    * @throws IOException
602    * @throws InterruptedException
603    * @throws KeeperException
604    */
605   @Test

607       InterruptedException, KeeperException {
608     testSplitBeforeSettingSplittingInZK(true);
609     testSplitBeforeSettingSplittingInZK(false);

612   private void testSplitBeforeSettingSplittingInZK(boolean nodeCreated) throws Exception {
613     final byte[] tableName = Bytes.toBytes("testSplitBeforeSettingSplittingInZK");
614     
615     HBaseAdmin admin = new HBaseAdmin(TESTING_UTIL.getConfiguration());
616     // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
617     HTableDescriptor htd = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
618     htd.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor("cf"));
619     admin.createTable(htd);
620 
621     List<HRegion> regions = null;
622     for (int i=0; i<100; i++) {
623       regions = cluster.getRegions(tableName);
624       if (regions.size() > 0) break;
625       Thread.sleep(100);
626     }
627     int regionServerIndex = cluster.getServerWith(regions.get(0).getRegionName());
628     HRegionServer regionServer = cluster.getRegionServer(regionServerIndex);
629     SplitTransaction st = null;
630     if (nodeCreated) {
631       st = new MockedSplitTransaction(regions.get(0), null) {
632         @Override
633         int transitionNodeSplitting(ZooKeeperWatcher zkw, HRegionInfo parent,
634             ServerName serverName, int version) throws KeeperException, IOException {
635           throw new TransitionToSplittingFailedException();
636         }
637       };
638     } else {
639       st = new MockedSplitTransaction(regions.get(0), null) {
640         @Override
641         void createNodeSplitting(ZooKeeperWatcher zkw, HRegionInfo region, ServerName serverName)
642             throws KeeperException, IOException {
643           throw new SplittingNodeCreationFailedException ();
644         }
645       };
646     }
647     String node = ZKAssign.getNodeName(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), regions.get(0)
648         .getRegionInfo().getEncodedName());
649     // make sure the client is uptodate
650     regionServer.getZooKeeper().sync(node);
651     for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
652       // We expect the znode to be deleted by this time. Here the znode could be in OPENED state and the 
653       // master has not yet deleted the znode.
654       if (ZKUtil.checkExists(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), node) != -1) {
655         Thread.sleep(100);
656       }
657     }
658     
659     try {
660       st.execute(regionServer, regionServer);
661     } catch (IOException e) {
662       // check for the specific instance in case the Split failed due to the existence of the znode in OPENED state.
663       // This will at least make the test to fail;
664       if (nodeCreated) {
665         assertTrue("Should be instance of TransitionToSplittingFailedException",
666             e instanceof TransitionToSplittingFailedException);
667       } else {
668         assertTrue("Should be instance of CreateSplittingNodeFailedException",
669             e instanceof SplittingNodeCreationFailedException );
670       }
671       node = ZKAssign.getNodeName(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), regions.get(0)
672           .getRegionInfo().getEncodedName());
673       // make sure the client is uptodate
674       regionServer.getZooKeeper().sync(node);
675       if (nodeCreated) {
676         assertFalse(ZKUtil.checkExists(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), node) == -1);
677       } else {
678         assertTrue(ZKUtil.checkExists(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), node) == -1);
679       }
680       assertTrue(st.rollback(regionServer, regionServer));
681       assertTrue(ZKUtil.checkExists(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), node) == -1);
682     }
683     if (admin.isTableAvailable(tableName) && admin.isTableEnabled(tableName)) {
684       admin.disableTable(tableName);
685       admin.deleteTable(tableName);
686     }
687   }

689   @Test
690   public void testShouldClearRITWhenNodeFoundInSplittingState() throws Exception {
691     final byte[] tableName = Bytes.toBytes("testShouldClearRITWhenNodeFoundInSplittingState");
692     HBaseAdmin admin = new HBaseAdmin(TESTING_UTIL.getConfiguration());
693     // Create table then get the single region for our new table.
694     HTableDescriptor htd = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
695     htd.addFamily(new HColumnDescriptor("cf"));
696     admin.createTable(htd);
697     for (int i = 0; cluster.getRegions(tableName).size() == 0 && i < 100; i++) {
698       Thread.sleep(100);
699     }
700     assertTrue("Table not online", cluster.getRegions(tableName).size() != 0);
701 
702     HRegion region = cluster.getRegions(tableName).get(0);
703     int regionServerIndex = cluster.getServerWith(region.getRegionName());
704     HRegionServer regionServer = cluster.getRegionServer(regionServerIndex);
705     SplitTransaction st = null;
706 
707     st = new MockedSplitTransaction(region, null) {
708       @Override
709       void createSplitDir(FileSystem fs, Path splitdir) throws IOException {
710         throw new IOException("");
711       }
712     };
713 
714     try {
715       st.execute(regionServer, regionServer);
716     } catch (IOException e) {
717       String node = ZKAssign.getNodeName(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), region
718           .getRegionInfo().getEncodedName());
719 
720       assertFalse(ZKUtil.checkExists(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), node) == -1);
721       AssignmentManager am = cluster.getMaster().getAssignmentManager();
722       for (int i = 0; !am.getRegionsInTransition().containsKey(
723           region.getRegionInfo().getEncodedName())
724           && i < 100; i++) {
725         Thread.sleep(200);
726       }
727       assertTrue("region is not in transition "+region,
728           am.getRegionsInTransition().containsKey(region.getRegionInfo().getEncodedName()));
729       RegionState regionState = am.getRegionsInTransition().get(region.getRegionInfo()
730           .getEncodedName());
731       assertTrue(regionState.getState() == RegionState.State.SPLITTING);
732       assertTrue(st.rollback(regionServer, regionServer));
733       assertTrue(ZKUtil.checkExists(regionServer.getZooKeeper(), node) == -1);
734       for (int i=0; am.getRegionsInTransition().containsKey(region.getRegionInfo().getEncodedName()) && i<100; i++) {
735         // Just in case the nodeDeleted event did not get executed.
736         Thread.sleep(200);
737       }
738       assertFalse("region is still in transition",
739           am.getRegionsInTransition().containsKey(region.getRegionInfo().getEncodedName()));
740     }
741     if (admin.isTableAvailable(tableName) && admin.isTableEnabled(tableName)) {
742       admin.disableTable(tableName);
743       admin.deleteTable(tableName);
744       admin.close();
745     }

783   private void insertData(final byte[] tableName, HBaseAdmin admin, HTable t) throws IOException,
784       InterruptedException {
785     Put p = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("row1"));
786     p.add(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), Bytes.toBytes("1"));
787     t.put(p);
788     p = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("row2"));
789     p.add(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), Bytes.toBytes("2"));
790     t.put(p);
791     p = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("row3"));
792     p.add(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), Bytes.toBytes("3"));
793     t.put(p);
794     p = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("row4"));
795     p.add(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("q1"), Bytes.toBytes("4"));
796     t.put(p);
797     admin.flush(tableName);
798   }

800   public static class MockedSplitTransaction extends SplitTransaction {
801 
802     private HRegion currentRegion;
803     public MockedSplitTransaction(HRegion r, byte[] splitrow) {
804       super(r, splitrow);
805       this.currentRegion = r;
806     }
807     
808     @Override
809     void transitionZKNode(Server server, RegionServerServices services, HRegion a, HRegion b)
810         throws IOException {
811       if (this.currentRegion.getRegionInfo().getTableNameAsString()
812           .equals("testShouldFailSplitIfZNodeDoesNotExistDueToPrevRollBack")) {
813         try {
814           if (!secondSplit){
815             callRollBack = true;
816             latch.await();
817           }
818         } catch (InterruptedException e) {
819         }
820        
821       }
822       super.transitionZKNode(server, services, a, b);
823       if (this.currentRegion.getRegionInfo().getTableNameAsString()
824           .equals("testShouldFailSplitIfZNodeDoesNotExistDueToPrevRollBack")) {
825         firstSplitCompleted = true;
826       }
827     }
828     @Override
829     public boolean rollback(Server server, RegionServerServices services) throws IOException {
830       if (this.currentRegion.getRegionInfo().getTableNameAsString()
831           .equals("testShouldFailSplitIfZNodeDoesNotExistDueToPrevRollBack")) {
832         if(secondSplit){
833           super.rollback(server, services);
834           latch.countDown();
835           return true;
836         }
837       }
838       return super.rollback(server, services);
839     }
840 
841   }

887   /**
888    * Ensure single table region is not on same server as the single .META. table
889    * region.
890    * @param admin
891    * @param hri
892    * @return Index of the server hosting the single table region
893    * @throws UnknownRegionException
894    * @throws MasterNotRunningException
895    * @throws ZooKeeperConnectionException
896    * @throws InterruptedException
897    */
898   private int ensureTableRegionNotOnSameServerAsMeta(final HBaseAdmin admin,
899       final HRegionInfo hri)
900   throws UnknownRegionException, MasterNotRunningException,
901   ZooKeeperConnectionException, InterruptedException {
902     MiniHBaseCluster cluster = TESTING_UTIL.getMiniHBaseCluster();
903     // Now make sure that the table region is not on same server as that hosting
904     // .META.  We don't want .META. replay polluting our test when we later crash
905     // the table region serving server.
906     int metaServerIndex = cluster.getServerWithMeta();
907     assertTrue(metaServerIndex != -1);
908     HRegionServer metaRegionServer = cluster.getRegionServer(metaServerIndex);
909     int tableRegionIndex = cluster.getServerWith(hri.getRegionName());
910     assertTrue(tableRegionIndex != -1);
911     HRegionServer tableRegionServer = cluster.getRegionServer(tableRegionIndex);
912     if (metaRegionServer.getServerName().equals(tableRegionServer.getServerName())) {
913       HRegionServer hrs = getOtherRegionServer(cluster, metaRegionServer);
914       assertNotNull(hrs);
915       assertNotNull(hri);
916       LOG.
917         info("Moving " + hri.getRegionNameAsString() + " to " +
918         hrs.getServerName() + "; metaServerIndex=" + metaServerIndex);
919       for (int i = 0; cluster.getMaster().getAssignmentManager()
920           .getRegionServerOfRegion(hri) == null
921           && i < 100; i++) {
922         Thread.sleep(10);
923       }
924       admin.move(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes(),
925         Bytes.toBytes(hrs.getServerName().toString()));
926     }
927     // Wait till table region is up on the server that is NOT carrying .META..
928     for (int i=0; i<100; i++) {
929       tableRegionIndex = cluster.getServerWith(hri.getRegionName());
930       if (tableRegionIndex != -1 && tableRegionIndex != metaServerIndex) break;
931       LOG.debug("Waiting on region move off the .META. server; current index " +
932         tableRegionIndex + " and metaServerIndex=" + metaServerIndex);
933       Thread.sleep(100);
934     }
935     assertTrue("Region not moved off .META. server", tableRegionIndex != -1
936         && tableRegionIndex != metaServerIndex);
937     // Verify for sure table region is not on same server as .META.
938     tableRegionIndex = cluster.getServerWith(hri.getRegionName());
939     assertTrue(tableRegionIndex != -1);
940     assertNotSame(metaServerIndex, tableRegionIndex);
941     return tableRegionIndex;
942   }

944   /**
945    * Find regionserver other than the one passed.
946    * Can't rely on indexes into list of regionservers since crashed servers
947    * occupy an index.
948    * @param cluster
949    * @param notThisOne
950    * @return A regionserver that is not <code>notThisOne</code> or null if none
951    * found
952    */
953   private HRegionServer getOtherRegionServer(final MiniHBaseCluster cluster,
954       final HRegionServer notThisOne) {
955     for (RegionServerThread rst: cluster.getRegionServerThreads()) {
956       HRegionServer hrs = rst.getRegionServer();
957       if (hrs.getServerName().equals(notThisOne.getServerName())) continue;
958       if (hrs.isStopping() || hrs.isStopped()) continue;
959       return hrs;
960     }
961     return null;
962   }
